description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Hand-Book for the Vale of Clwyd; containing a topographical and historical description of the towns of Rhyl, Abergele, Saint Asaph, Denbigh, and Ruthin; with all the adjacent villages, castles, mansions, churches, monuments, antiquities, picturesque scenery, and every object of attraction, etc. [With illustrations and a folding map.]" Author: DAVIS, William - Perpetual Curate of Jesus Chapel, Llanfair Dyffryn Clwyd Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.c.20." Page: 147 Place of Publishing: Ruthin Date of Publishing: 1856 Publisher: Isaac Clarke Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000880759 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
